entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Szabolcs 2002. Evaluation of the work of the Mayors Office in Nyíregyháza by the residents of the 2nd national individual election district in Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg county.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F28: TÁRKI Szabolcs 2002. Evaluation of the work of the Mayors Office in Nyíregyháza by the residents of the 2nd national individual election district in Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg county.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Gazsó, Tibor
entry.dcterms:description: local and national familiarity with political happenings, party preferences, satisfaction with the work of the national and local political leadership, reputation and evaluation of candidates of the 2002 parliamentary elections
entry.dcterms:subject: mass political behavior, attitudes
political ideology
elections
entry.dcterms:coverage: Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg county Parliamentary electoral district number 2
entry.dcterms:subject: person
survey data
cross-section
Within the electorial districts, voting circles were randomly selected, in which respondents were identified using the random walking method and the Leslie Kish-key.
face-to-face interview
